title: 0.13.1-1 fails on build on nd 9.0 and 18.04
body:
```shell
neurodebian@smaug ~/deb/builds/datalad/0.13.1-1 % grep '^FAILED' *build
datalad_0.13.1-1~nd18.04+1_amd64.build:FAILED (SKIP=133, errors=11)
datalad_0.13.1-1~nd90+1_amd64.build:FAILED (SKIP=133, errors=11)
```
full logs at http://neuro.debian.net/_files/_buildlogs/datalad/0.13.1

summary list of fails
```
neurodebian@smaug ~/deb/builds/datalad/0.13.1-1 % grep '^ERROR: data' datalad_0.13.1-1~nd90+1_amd64.build | nl
     1	ERROR: datalad.distribution.tests.test_create_sibling.test_target_ssh_recursive(False,)
     2	ERROR: datalad.distribution.tests.test_create_sibling.test_replace_and_relative_sshpath(False,)
     3	ERROR: datalad.downloaders.tests.test_http.test_HTMLFormAuthenticator_httpretty
     4	ERROR: datalad.downloaders.tests.test_http.test_HTTPBearerTokenAuthenticator
     5	ERROR: datalad.downloaders.tests.test_http.test_HTTPLorisTokenAuthenticator
     6	ERROR: datalad.downloaders.tests.test_http.test_lorisadapter
     7	ERROR: datalad.downloaders.tests.test_http.test_scenario_2
     8	ERROR: datalad.downloaders.tests.test_http.test_authfail404_interactive
     9	ERROR: datalad.downloaders.tests.test_http.test_authfail404_noninteractive
    10	ERROR: datalad.support.tests.test_network.test_get_local_file_url
    11	ERROR: datalad.tests.test_witless_runner.test_runner
```
overall built fine only on these debians:
```
neurodebian@smaug ~/deb/builds/datalad/0.13.1-1 % grep OK summary.build
datalad_0.13.1-1~nd100+1_amd64.build	OK	47:36.37 real, 1764.31 user, 1281.61 sys, 3321928 out
datalad_0.13.1-1~nd110+1_amd64.build	OK	37:07.36 real, 1264.85 user, 999.79 sys, 3258584 out
datalad_0.13.1-1~nd+1_amd64.build	OK	37:17.01 real, 1266.94 user, 1012.11 sys, 3316264 out
```
the others are dependencies issues.. although strange for 20.04 since python3-annexremote is available, so probably something didn't update -- I will check
